item.name: Swap shift-6 and option-shift-2
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::KEY_6, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::KEY_2, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT,
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::KEY_2, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_OPTION | MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::KEY_6, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT,
